summary:
This is an overhaul of the orcish weapons to make them match my male set of armour.
This also makes them a match to the Orc ignot
descriptionHtml:
Sorry this took so long to get up and posted water pump on the ca18det took alot longer to change hahah

1024x1024 Res

New Normal Map\'s

Color to match Orc ignot

Color also match\'s my male armour found here

http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6280

Thank you for viewing and downloading this file

Install

Simply drag and drop into your skyrim install dir
author: polarpop
